amlInterruptTitle: Rhaid i'ch cwmni fod wedi cofrestru gyda chorff goruchwylio AML
text1: I gadarnhau eich cofrestriad Atal Gwyngalchu Arian (AML), mae angen i ni wirio bod enw'ch cwmni yr un fath Ã¢'r un sydd gan eich corff goruchwylio.
text2: If the AML registration is in your name, the details will not match and we will reject your application welsh.
text3: I gofrestru eich cwmni fel asiant awdurdodedig, bydd angen i chi
link1: register the company with an AML supervisory body welsh
text4: Neu, i gofrestru'ch hun fel asiant awdurdodedig,
link2: gallwch wneud cais fel unig fasnachwr.
